entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch gave a loud blast on her silver whistle. She is the one who started the Quidditch match.

entities.name: angelina johnson
entities.description: 'And the Quaffle is taken immediately by Angelina Johnson of Gryffindor – what an excellent Chaser that girl is, and rather attractive, too – '

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: 'JORDAN!' 'Sorry , Professor.' The Weasley twins' friend, Lee Jordan, was doing the commentary for the match,

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: The Weasley twins' friend, Lee Jordan, was doing the commentary for the match, closely watched by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: 'And she’s really belting along up there, a neat pass to Alicia Spinnet, a good find of Oliver Wood’s, last year only a reserve –'

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: 'And she’s really belting along up there, a neat pass to Alicia Spinnet, a good find of Oliver Wood’s, last year only a reserve –'

entities.name: marcus flint
entities.description: 'back to Johnson and – no, Slytherin have taken the Quaffle, Slytherin captain Marcus Flint gains the Quaffle and off he goes –'

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: 'Gryffindor take the Quaffle – that’s Chaser Katie Bell of Gryffindor there, nice dive around Flint, off up the field and – OUCH –'
